name: Guntheidon
text: Ah… so the whispers did not deceive me. I thought I sensed a new presence meddling in the dungeon’s affairs. You must be the new Dungeonologist.

name: Guntheidon
text: Forgive the intrusion, but when one has lived in the depths for as long as I have, one grows curious. I am Guntheidon, keeper of secrets, master of arcane arts and… occasional mushroom forager, at your service.

name: Guntheidon
text: The dungeon speaks to me, you know. Well, not literally, but in a way… The creatures may seem wild, but they speak to those who know how to listen. Do you listen, I wonder?

name: Guntheidon
text: I’ve seen a few come and go through these halls. You’re a rare breed, aren’t you? No sword, no shield - just a notebook. Brave… or foolish? I have yet to decide. Alas, always good to have a wizard on your side.

name: Guntheidon
text: If you seek guidance, young Dungeonologist, just ponder this mystical orb and I shall appear before you - as long as I have nothing else going on, of course. And remember - not everything down here works by the book, you know. Best be prepared for the unexpected.

name: Guntheidon
text: Now, let’s see if you’re as clever as your predecessor, shall we? *Vanishes in a puff of smoke*
